chat_history.message: Hello, My iPhone 12 Pro has the above issue: My charging cable overheats and doesn't charge properly anymore. I'd like to request a replacement under warranty. Thank you for your help,

Hi ecomobile,

the customer reported that the charger gets too hot and doesn't charge the device. 

Please send the customer a new charger. 

Thanks for your help in keeping our shared customers happy!
Diogo Back Market customer Care

Dear Backcare,

We are sorry that the customer is having issues with the charging cable. Under the Quality Charter, we are able to give a commercial gesture of 10 euros for the customer for the defective cable. Can you check with the customer regarding this commercial gesture. Thank you.

Regards,
CH

Hi ecomobile,

the customer doesn't want the commercial gesture, he wants the cable. 

Please send a charger to the charger.

Thanks for your help in keeping our shared customers happy!
Diogo Back Market customer Care

Dear Backcare,

Unfortunately we are unable to ship the cable to the customer. As such, we are offering 10 euros as a commercial gesture for the cable in accordance to the Quality Charter.

Regards,
RK
